attributes.additional_details: In the light of the American’s recent suspension of $800 million in military aid to Pakistan over severe ongoing concerns about Pakistan’s human rights record, particularly with regard to religious and other minorities, the British Pakistani Christian Association (BPCA) has calls for the UK to cut its aid budget to Pakistan, and suggests the funds would be better spent on causes like food and aid for the starving in Somalia and the horn of Africa or to tackle our national debt crises.
